```{r libraries}
library(knitr)
library(dplyr)

library(DT)
library(magrittr)

dir <- "/data/NHLBI_IDSS/rawdata/NIDDK-15_temp/count/merge_processing/harmony/timepoint_patient/sequential_colors"
```

[Harmony^1^](https://portals.broadinstitute.org/harmony/) v0.1.1 was used to integrate all samples together by using time point and patient as batches.

# Total Cell Type Count
```{r}
data <- read.table(file.path(dir, "../Total_predicted.celltype.l2.csv"), sep=',', header=FALSE)
names(data) <- c("Cell Type", "Number of Cells")
DT::datatable(data, rownames=F, autoHideNavigation = T, options = list(pageLength = dim(data)[[1]]))
```

# Cell Type Count Per Patient by Time Point {.tabset}
```{r, results='asis'}
for (filename in str_sort(Sys.glob(file.path(dir, '../', 'CellTypeCount_l2_CRPatient_*.csv')), numeric=TRUE)) {
data <- read.table(filename, sep=',', header=TRUE)
cat("## Sample", strsplit(tools::file_path_sans_ext(basename(filename)), '_')[[1]][[4]])
cat("\n")
print(htmltools::tagList(DT::datatable(data, rownames=F, autoHideNavigation = T, options = list(pageLength = dim(data)[[1]]))))
cat('\n')
}


```

```{r, results='asis'}

}
```
